summons.name: Sacred Cryo Pearl
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 1 Cryo DMG, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Drunken Mist
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 1 Cryo DMG, heal your active character for 2 HP.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Frostflake Seki no To
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 2 Cryo DMG.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Melody Loop
summons.content: End Phase: Heal all your characters for 1 HP and your active character gains Hydro Application.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Reflection
summons.content: When your active character receives DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.\nUsage(s): 1. When the Usage is depleted, this card will not be discarded.\nEnd Phase: Discard this card, deal 1 Hydro DMG.

summons.name: Guoba
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 2 Pyro DMG.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Oz
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 1 Electro DMG.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Large Wind Spirit
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 2 Anemo DMG. Usage(s): 3 After your character or Summon triggers a Swirl reaction: Convert the Elemental Type of this card and change its DMG dealt to the element Swirled. (Can only be converted once before leaving the field)

summons.name: Dandelion Field
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 2 Anemo DMG, heal your active character for 1 HP.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Cuilein-Anbar
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 2 Dendro DMG.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Oceanid Mimic Ferret
summons.content: Ferret: Deal 2 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. 2 Uses.

summons.name: Oceanid Mimic Raptor
summons.content: Raptor: Deal 1 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. 3 Uses.

summons.name: Oceanid Mimic Frog
summons.content: Frog: Can block 2 DMG. Once this effect is depleted, deal 2 Hydro DMG.

summons.name: Shadowsword: Lone Gale
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 1 Anemo DMG.\nUsage(s): 2

summons.name: Shadowsword: Galloping Frost
summons.content: End Phase: Deal 1 Cryo DMG.\nUsage(s): 2
